name: SendCrypto
description: SendCrypto ($SENDC): App for fast, safe, social crypto payments between friends. An app where settling up feels like catching up, and where crypto enhances friendships rather than complicating them! We also enable businesses to accept crypto payments in their app, online, or in person and tap into a growing community of crypto holders. Our multi-chain layer 2 wallet solution aims to become the Web3 alternative to all current cash apps, by giving a simple-to-use subscription-based solution for instant and fee-less crypto transactions.
